story:
Here's their career story rewritten as a narrative:

From humble beginnings as a Coconut Creek High School graduate in 2002, this ambitious professional began pursuing their passion for media production at The Art Institute of Ft. Lauderdale. While their studies weren't completed, their natural talent for sales and customer service would soon become apparent.

Their professional journey truly began in 2013 as a Residential Sales Specialist, where they made their mark selling TV cable, internet, and phone services. Their knack for relationship-building helped them achieve an impressive 97% revenue penetration rate across multiple properties. They didn't just sell services – they managed VIP accounts and trained other sales teams, showing early signs of leadership potential.

After three successful years, they took a brief but impactful role as a Sales Representative in 2016, where they excelled at cold-calling and building new customer relationships. Their bilingual abilities in English and Spanish proved to be a valuable asset throughout their career.

Since 2017, they've found their true calling as a Sales Associate, where they've consistently shattered expectations by exceeding sales goals by up to 224%. Their track record speaks for itself – they were named Best Sales Representative four consecutive times in 2014, received two Customer Service Excellence awards that same year, and earned the title of Top Sales Rep in 2015.

In their current role, they've become known for creating lasting relationships within the OTF community and maintaining a positive, motivating environment. They're not just focused on sales – they're dedicated to ensuring every client has an exceptional experience, from the first point of contact through proper onboarding and beyond.

Their diverse skill set spans from billing and credit management to media production, and they're particularly adept at handling VIP customers and managing new construction properties. Their story is one of consistent growth, exceptional customer service, and remarkable sales achievement, driven by a genuine desire to exceed expectations in business development.
